channel.title: Visualization on Linden's
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Linden's

item.title: Bar Plots
item.description: Does Bar Plots come with alcohol? library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Warning: package 'gsubfn' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: proto ## Warning: package 'proto' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: RSQLite ## Warning: package 'RSQLite' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Scatterplots
item.description: scatterplots are equally confusing library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) #extracting data-------------- query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS career_HR,sum(SO) AS career_SO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) #visualizing the data-------------- ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR),size=5,color="red")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts VS. Homeruns for Great Hitters")+ xlab("career strikeouts")+ ylab("career homeruns")

item.title: Time Series
item.description: times series is not impressive to me library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) library(sqldf) #extracting the data-------- query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) #vidualizing the data-------- ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Through the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")
